description: Winamp is a free Windows media player that supports various multimedia formats, such as .MP3 , .M4A , and .MP4 . The app also supports plugins to extend its functionality. For example, AVS is a supported plugin that allows you to visualize audio by displaying animations, such as explosions and waveforms, as it plays in Winamp.
If you have installed Winamp and the AVS plugin, you can find APE plugin effect files in the following directory:

images.alt: Screenshot of a .ape file in VideoLAN VLC media player
images.caption: APE file open in VideoLAN VLC media player
